definition: A dental prosthetic used to replace missing teeth, typically made of artificial materials and designed to fit into the mouth. It is commonly used to restore the functionality and aesthetics of the oral cavity.

examples.english: My dental prosthesis doesn't fit properly.

examples.german: Der Zahnersatz muss regelmäßig gereinigt werden.
examples.english: The dental prosthesis needs to be cleaned regularly.

examples.german: Zahnersatz kann aus verschiedenen Materialien hergestellt werden.
examples.english: Dental prosthesis can be made from various materials.
